name: Kekegi's Unbreakable Spirit
flavorText: This stone is said to have once adorned the wise monk Kekegi’s brow. The hero’s spirit never once wavered during his legendary Five Trials, and that same indomitable will now suffuses this headgear.
flavorTextHtml: This stone is said to have once adorned the wise monk Kekegi’s brow. The hero’s spirit never once wavered during his legendary Five Trials, and that same indomitable will now suffuses this headgear.

primary.textHtml: Critical Hit Chance Increased by [4.5 - 6.0]%

secondary.textHtml: Damaging enemies has a chance to grant you an effect that removes the Spirit cost of your abilities for 3 seconds. (Monk Only) [2 - 4]
secondary.text: Damaging enemies has a chance to grant you an effect that removes the Spirit cost of your abilities for 3 seconds. (Monk Only) [2 - 4]
